official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require operators of commuter service airports to establish air transportation security programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require operators of commuter service airports to establish air transportation security programs.
